UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Synergistic antibiotic effect of looped antimicrobial peptide CLP-19 with bactericidal and bacteriostatic agents.
Literature.Author: Li D, Yang Y, Tian Z, Lv J, Sun F, Wang Q, Liu Y, Xia P

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:0.68±1.05% Hemolysis=128 µg/ml,Horse erythrocytes:38.71±10.05% Hemolysis=256 µg/ml,Horse erythrocytes:72.35±17.50% Hemolysis=512 µg/ml,Vero cells:3.39±1.44% Killing=128 µg/ml,Vero cells:45.53±17.52% Killing=256 µg/ml,Vero cells:91.23±30.71% Killing=512 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>256µg/ml)
